text: Clark Randolph "Randy" White is a former Democratic member of the West Virginia Senate, representing the 11th district from 2002–2011. Earlier he was a member of the West Virginia House of Delegates from 1996 through 2002. White lost the Democratic Primary to Gregory Tucker. ==External links== *Project Vote Smart - Senator Clark Randy White (WV) profile *Follow the Money - Randy White **2008 2006 2004 2002 Senate campaign contributions **2000 1998 House campaign contributions Category:West Virginia state senators Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the West Virginia House of Delegates Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Randy White (West Virginia politician)
